resources.string:
This is a Demo of how to implement the Drawer Navigation according to standard of Google.

The final effects are different between version of Android version:
@ before 4.4: Drawer over ActionBar;
@ 4.4: Drawer over ActionBar and below status bar, translucent status bar with gradient gray.
@ over 5.0: Drawer over ActionBar and below status bar, translucent status bar with gradient gray.

Slide from the left of the screen and see it.
